navigation.timeTravelTooltip: This shows a selection of my technical skills from the beginning of my career as a developer in IT or on the internet.

welcome.title: Hello. I am Mr. X.
welcome.subtitle: Creator of this resume game.
welcome.intro: You are inside an interactive developer profile: frontend specialist, a bit of a fullstacker, product architect and IT handyman.
welcome.twist: But everything is arranged differently here.
welcome.quest: To find out who is behind this project, what they can do, how they think and how to contact ‚Äî you need to complete the game.
welcome.finale: In the finale, skills, projects, code and contacts will open ‚Äî and it will become clear whether our goals match.

gameOver.title: Game Over
gameOver.message: You lost all lives. Try again!

philosophy.title: Our goals and values don't match.
philosophy.subtext: Apparently, we have different views on development and teamwork. Effective collaboration under such conditions will be difficult.
philosophy.suggestion: Try playing the game again, perhaps you should be more loyal to the team's philosophy...

projectTransition.congratulations: Congratulations! You reached the level where the study of project technologies begins.
